results.text_hl: Medication-Related @<m>DISEASE_Osteonecrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010020 @@@Osteonecrosis@@@ of @DISEASE_Jaw_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D007571 @@@the Jaw@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ Taking High-Dose @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@.

results.title: PDGF-simvastatin delivery stimulates osteogenesis in heat-induced osteonecrosis.
results.text_hl: PDGF-@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ delivery stimulates osteogenesis in heat-induced @<m>DISEASE_Osteonecrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010020 @@@osteonecrosis@@@.

results.title: Synergistic local drug delivery in a piglet model of ischemic osteonecrosis: a preliminary study.
results.text_hl: A locally injectable system sequentially delivering an antiresorptive drug (@CHEMICAL_Clodronic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004002 @@@clodronate@@@) followed by an osteogenic agent (@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@) was hypothesized to improve femoral head microarchitecture, size, and shape compared with untreated or partial treatment groups in an established piglet @<m>DISEASE_Osteonecrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010020 @@@osteonecrosis@@@ model.

citations.NLM: Zou Y, Fisher PD, Horstmann JK, Talwalkar V, Milbrandt TA, Puleo DA. Synergistic local drug delivery in a piglet model of ischemic osteonecrosis: a preliminary study. J Pediatr Orthop B. 2015 Nov;24(6):483-92. PMID: 26196370
citations.BibTeX: @article{26196370, title={Synergistic local drug delivery in a piglet model of ischemic osteonecrosis: a preliminary study.}, author={Zou Y and Fisher PD and Horstmann JK and Talwalkar V and Milbrandt TA and Puleo DA}, journal={J Pediatr Orthop B}, volume={24}, number={6}, pages={483-92}}

results.title: Effect of simvastatin on steroid-induced osteonecrosis evidenced by the serum lipid level and hepatic cytochrome P4503A in a rabbit model.
